Notes: An invisible spot from which some Star Bits can spawn. If SW_APPEAR is used, they will only appear when triggering said switch. Otherwise, the Star Bits will spawn when attacking the spot with a Spin Attack.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Star Bits
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of Star Bits to be spawned. Default is 5.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The Star Bits will appear only when this switch is activated.
